scripts.format: prettier --write 'dist/**/*.html' 'dist/*.html' && find dist -type f -name '*.html' -exec sed -i '' '/^$/d' {} + && node buildScript/cacheTimestamp.js
scripts.build-format: npm run build && npm run format
scripts.build-fallback: npm run build && node buildScript/fallbackImage.js true && npm run build && node buildScript/fallbackImage.js false
scripts.build-fallback-format: npm run build-fallback && npm run format
scripts.build-local: npm run build && npm run copy-theme
scripts.restart-local: npm run build-local && npm run dev
